KITCHENER, ON N2M 4Y5, Canada · (514) 573-5543 · steeve.cabrel@outlook.com

Hi, my name is Steeve Tchatchouang and I'm a software developer based in Kitchener, Ontario. I have experience working with a range of programming languages, including C#, C/C++, Typescript, Python, Dart, SQL, and NoSQL, and frameworks such as Flutter. I am passionate about creating efficient and scalable code that meets the needs of clients.

Experience

Software Developer

Brock Solutions

Work with an agile team to develop, test and maintain Brock Solutions' upper-level software for automated baggage handling systems in airports worldwide. Produce clean, efficient code based on specifications. Collaborate with team members to determine best practices and client requirements for software implementations. Verify and deploy programs and systems at different client sites. Analyse, report, and resolve technical and application issues. Participate in code reviews with the internal team. Collaborate with technology partners to ensure the best possible performance of our engineered solutions.

November 2019 - Present

Automation Application Specialist

Consulting with other departments to gather requirements for developing solutions to automate the Bill of Material (BOM). Test and Debug the source code for better quality assurance during the software development process. Creating and maintaining accurate and concise documentation related to developing, configuring and maintaining applications developed. DriveWorks Administration and project development.
